questions.question: A machine learning specialist is using SageMaker Clarify to evaluate potential bias in a customer satisfaction prediction model. The data includes sensitive attributes like gender and age. Which of the following actions can SageMaker Clarify perform to detect and address bias in this context?
options: It will generate new features from the existing data to balance all classes.
It will run an analysis on specified sensitive attributes and generate a report with bias metrics.
It will optimize the model by re-training it on only the sensitive features to reduce bias.
It will apply synthetic data generation to equalize sample sizes across all categories.
correct_answers: It will run an analysis on specified sensitive attributes and generate a report with bias metrics.
